A very good game, but I think that there should be a better anti-cheat system because there is still a load of hackers, even though I have prime..
Yes very good game. No salty people at all.

so much cheaters on non prime and PRIME matchmaking.
ive reported hundreds of cheaters and no action from valve.

it is literally impossible to rank up from gold nova rank due to massive cheaters.

the problem is getting worse, not a single prime matchmaking without cheater, hackers, wallhack, aimlock. its so crazy its cheaters fiesta.

i regretted spent money on this game (prime upgrade, skin etc)
